data.eml:eml: The Australia-New Zealand connection re-visited, with two new species of Cartomothrips (Thysanoptera, Phlaeothripinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mound, Laurence A., Walker, Annette K. (2012): The Australia-New Zealand connection re-visited, with two new species of Cartomothrips (Thysanoptera, Phlaeothripinae). Zootaxa 3487: 58-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.211167
